resources.string:
• Architectural and Design Tips Hub – Free and AI-Powered:
 Explore 50+ categories and 15,000+ tips with clear intent and real-world examples.

 • Who Can Use It:
 Students, designers, architects, and educators seeking structured guidance.

 • Content Highlights:
 Concept development, spatial planning, materials, sustainability, urban design, and post-occupancy evaluation.

 • Platform Details:
 Ad-supported and AI-assisted to ensure wide coverage and consistency.

 • Disclaimer:
 Rules are for guidance and inspiration. Apply thoughtfully, considering project context, local codes, and professional standards. Does not replace formal education or expert consultation. Use responsibly and adapt rules to your needs.
